org.sbs.bears.ftc.robot

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sbs.bears.ftc.robot.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models the Robot and is in a has-a relationship with the robot controllers.

    Controllers in the Robot:

    • Arm and Grabber Controller
    • Drive Angle Controller (Beta)
    • Ring Subsytem Controller
    • RoadRunner Drive Controller (Drive Encoders)
    • Thread Controller (Beta)
    • Blocker Controller

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Marc D Nichitiu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ArmAndGrabberManager armCtrl
      This is the controller for the Arm and Grabber.
      BlockerController blockerCtrl
      This is the Blocker Controller.
      DriveAngleController driveAngleCtrl
      Deprecated. 
      this is in beta Do Not Use
      RingSubsytemController ringCtrl
      This is the controller for the entire Ring Subsystem.
      RRDriveControllerNoOdom rrCtrlNoOdom
      This is the RoadRunner wrapper.
      ThreadController threadCtrl
      Deprecated.

    • Field Detail

      • armCtrl

        public ArmAndGrabberManager armCtrl
        This is the controller for the Arm and Grabber. See here for more information.

      • driveAngleCtrl

        public DriveAngleController driveAngleCtrl
        Deprecated. this is in beta Do Not Use
        This is the controller for finely changing the angle of the robot. Note that this is in beta.

      • ringCtrl

        public RingSubsytemController ringCtrl
        This is the controller for the entire Ring Subsystem. It contains a Launch Controller and Intake Controller.

      • rrCtrlNoOdom

        public RRDriveControllerNoOdom rrCtrlNoOdom
        This is the RoadRunner wrapper. It allows client classes to very simply use the main functions of RoadRunner without meddling with the code.

      • threadCtrl

        public ThreadController threadCtrl
        Deprecated. This is in Beta. Do Not Use.
        This is the Thread Controller. It is in Beta.

      • blockerCtrl

        public BlockerController blockerCtrl
        This is the Blocker Controller. It controls the blockers in front of the robot.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Robot

        public Robot(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareMap hardwareMap,
             org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.Telemetry telemetry)
        This is the constructor for the Robot object. One must provide it with the hardwareMap of the robot and the telemetry object, which will notify the client the opmode state.
        Parameters:
        hardwareMap - the hardwareMap, which is necessary for initialization of hardware devices.
        telemetry - the telemetry object, which is necessary for notification of termination of initialization as well as other operations.
